code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import api from"../api/axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PatientList(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[q,setQ]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetchList();},[]);const fetchList=async()=>{try{const r=await api.get("/patients",{params:{q}});setItems(r.data);}catch(err){setItems([]);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Search",value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchList,children:"Search"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:items.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[p.first_name," ",p.last_name," \u2014 ",p.contact]},p._id))})]});}
